reviewText: When I was younger, this was the show to watch! Veggietales is one of the greatest shows around for kids and this DVD in specific is a nice one to add to the collection. The episodes always have a point or lesson to learn and this DVD includes lessons in a very fun way to learn them.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was really little when this show first started. And to be honest, I love this series alot more as a teenager than when I was younger. Yeah, weird, huh?Anyways, to the review...This episode is about loving your neighbor. It first starts out with a re-telling of the Good Samaritan story in a ryhmning fashion. Then you have Larry's 'silly songs' segment, this one is called "The Hairbrush Song"Then you have the main feature, 'The Gourds Must Be Crazy'It's a really good story about being a friend to those who are different because God made all of us special and different from each other.The only disappointment I had is the DVD was too short!It was rather enjoyable, but I wish I saw Junior on the USS Applepies alot longer than that. It would of been a pretty good space adventure. Junior is my favorite character out of all the vegetables ^_^Still, I totally recommend this DVD! It's a good story and a good lesson!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Birthday gift for my two year old niece. She really likes VeggieTales. I enjoyed them when I was teaching children's church. Nice and colorful for kids but bible stories/principals worked into them.This one teaches kids about being nice and friends with people who may seem different.

reviewText: Teaches the basics of loving one another in a funny and comical way.  I love the fact that I don't have to worry when my kids are watching Veggie Tales and teaches some great morals to children too!!

reviewText: It's about time they put this on DVD!  It's great, classic VeggieTales.  Fliberoloo has been on DVD's before, but the tale when Junior goes into space has never been on DVD before.  Thanks Big Idea!

reviewText: Veggie Tales is awesome.  It was fun and interesting to watch.  My son watched it when he had the flu and it was so captivating and filled with goodness that it made him forget that he was sick.

reviewText: I would really recommend this classic Veggie Tale to young and old alike.  It teaches about loving and respecting others even if they seem different from us, and that every person has worth.  It is done in a very clever way, and as with all Veggie Tales, the dialogue is funny appealing to both kids and adults.  What other story would include "popcorn ball" meteors?  Great DVD.  I highly recommend it because of the important values it teaches.

reviewText: Veggie Tales has an awesome way of connecting with kids and families. Our whole family enjoys these shows and we are never disappointed or fearful of content Love it!
